rooms.description: A welcoming entry with natural light and Vastu-friendly orientation.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing east to invite positive energy.
Adjacent to the kitchen and designed for family meals, aligned with Vastu principles.
Private master bedroom with south-facing floor-to-ceiling windows to promote relaxation and sleep quality.
Comfortable guest bedroom integrated into the layout, ensuring privacy and tranquility.
Functional space for storage and utilities, located near the kitchen area.

openings.description: Vastu-approved entrance to welcome positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling window in living room for ample natural light and ventilation.
Interior door connecting the dining area with kitchen.

level_details.notes: The ground floor is designed with an open-plan layout to maximize space and adhere to local building norms. Floor-to-ceiling windows are strategically placed for optimal natural lighting and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines.
